attributes.action: Stop the BBC making and broadcasting any more episodes of Eastenders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This dark, repetitive, poorly written and performed abomination of a TV programme insults the intelligence of millions of people every week and drives me mad with its atrocious screeching accents

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
